reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Overall, we were delighted by our second stay at Coco LaPalm. We had stayed several years ago and decided to try them again after getting a great deal on a Junior Suite with the included Continental breakfast. As a repeat customer and with luck on our side, we snagged room number 526. It was excellently located, with a peekaboo view of the ocean through the trees. Nice and quiet, large and comfy.
reviews.title: Second Stay, Wonderful Setting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A few small issues came up with the room and were addressed promptly, sometimes a little too prompt (did they need to work on the light and fan in the middle of my wonderful massage?!). We did notice a few ants when we left out some food, so use the fridge for any leftovers or open food items. Also, the air conditioning unit had a very bright display of the temperature right by the bed, enough that we didn't need a night light. We ended up throwing a washcloth over it, wished we had a little piece of duct tape.
reviews.title: A Beautiful Place to Relax and Rejuvenate

reviews.text: The included breakfast was pretty good, several days we split the continental and one of the larger meals, the omelets and banana bread were very good. Service was also pretty darn good most days, while they seem a little indifferent, they do get to you quickly.
reviews.title: Breakfast on 7 mile beach

reviews.text: Our housekeeper, Marie, was a delight. She managed to find a couple of better pillows after a couple of days, the ones we had were pretty flat. The bed was big and pretty comfortable. All of the linens were adequate, not luxurious. Clean and lots of space in the bathroom. We appreciated the aloe lotion they provided and used the shampoo and body wash from dispensers in the shower. No conditioner. The double shower was nice when we had swimsuits to clean too.
reviews.title: Great Hotel, Staff and Location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And bonus! Joan who gives massages on the beach was wonderful. We regularly get massages and she was excellent, both for my woosie Swedish and my husband's much needed deep tissue.
reviews.title: Nice stay
